MRC File Mover Tool
==================

Instructions:
1. Double-click "MRC File Mover.exe" to start the program
2. Click "Browse" to select your source folder (where MRC files are created)
3. Click "Browse" to select your destination folder (where files should be moved)
4. Click "Start" to begin monitoring
5. The program will check every 5 minutes for new MRC files
6. Click "Stop" when you want to stop the monitoring

Notes:
- The program will remember your folder selections for next time
- Check the log display for file movement status
- A log file (mrc_mover.log) is created in the same folder for detailed history
